remarks: Define a function shifter.  This operation offsets the value argument of a function (ordinarily on a subset of ` CC ` ) and produces a new function on ` CC ` .  See ~ shftval for its value.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jul-2005.)
statement:
df-shft $p |- shift = ( f e. _V , x e. CC |-> { <. y , z >. | ( y e. CC /\ ( y - x ) f z ) } ) $.
$d f x y z $.
